metadata.title: CVE-2017-17446 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The Mem_File_Reader::read_avail function in Data_Reader.cpp in theGame_Music_Emu library (aka game-music-emu) 0.6.1 does not ensure anon-negative size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17446` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgme0 - 0.6.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: game-music-emu package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.2-1').
